text: Eddie Ioane (born June 2, 1966) is a Samoan rugby union player. He played as lock. ==Career== His first match for Samoa was against Tonga, at Apia, on June 17, 1990. He was also part of the 1991 Rugby World Cup roster. He retired after the World Cup. In the NPC he played for Auckland.It's always worth reading about again the day Manu Samoa arrived on the Rugby World Cup scene and beat Wales ==Personal life== He is married with the former Black Fern Sandra Wihongi and he is the father of Akira and Rieko Ioane, both of them playing for the All Blacks Sevens and for the All Blacks. ==References== ==External links== * Eddie Ioane International Statistics Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Apia Category:Samoan rugby union players Category:Samoan expatriates in New Zealand Category:Rugby union locks Category:Samoa international rugby union players
